citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. There is a buildup of dust, dirt, and debris on the walls in house # 1 and on the back side of the set of
guinea pig racks with the green tubs. Ineffective cleaning of room surfaces and animal racks can expose the guinea pigs
to potential disease hazards. Correct by ensuring animal rooms are kept clean and maintained to support good animal
husbandry and health. Correct by March 16, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.31(b) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. There is a buildup of dust, dirt, and debris on the walls in house # 1 and on the back side of the set of 
guinea pig racks with the green tubs. Ineffective cleaning of room surfaces and animal racks can expose the guinea pigs 
to potential disease hazards. Correct by ensuring animal rooms are kept clean and maintained to support good animal 
husbandry and health. Correct by March 16, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
